alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:07PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Comanche, northwestern Cotton and east central Tillman Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Cookietown, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga and Faxon. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 27 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
